original_text:
“The snorting of their horses is heard from Dan;
    at the sound of the neighing of their stallions
    the whole land quakes.
They come and devour the land and all that fills it,
    the city and those who dwell in it.
korean_text: 그 말의 부르짖음이 단에서부터 들리고 그 준마들이 우는 소리에 온 땅이 진동하며 그들이 이르러 이 땅과 그 소유와 성읍과 그 중의 주민을 삼켰도다

sentences.original_text: The snorting of their horses is heard from Dan
at the sound of the neighing of their stallions
They come and devour the land

sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 가득 찬 모든 것을

sentences.original_text: and those who dwell in it
